items.formulation: Purified enzyme stored in: (I) desalting buffer (TEA–HCl, 10 mmol L-1, pH 7.5) at 8°C; (II) as above but at -20°C; (III) 50% (v/v) glycerol and desalting buffer at -20°C; (IV) freeze-dried and stored at -20°C. Purification buffers: TEA–HCl, 50 mmol L-1, pH 7.5 with 0, 0.2 or 0.8 mmol L-1 CaCl2 as needed.
items.name: RADH
items.purification_method: Three-step protocol: initial size exclusion chromatography (SEC) for desalting, anion exchange chromatography, followed by a second SEC to remove NaCl and adjust Ca2+ content. All steps at room temperature (20-25°C).
items.purity_specification: SDS–PAGE on 4–12% Bis–Tris gels, stained with SimplyBlue SafeStain or SilverXpress Silver Staining Kit.
items.special_treatment: Protein concentrations determined by Bradford assay (BSA standard). Native MW determined by SEC on Superdex 200 column, calibration with standard proteins.
